plot: Air in Summer is an elaboration of the Summer Arc in the anime series where Kanna, Ryuuya and Uraha goes on a journey to find Kanna's mother. It shows more events (such as running away from pursurers) that happened along the way while keeping most of the original scenes intact.
opening_theme: "Tori no Uta" (鳥の詩; "Bird's Poem") by Lia
